!
! Extreme Networks VOSS DVR Configuration
! Distributed Virtual Routing
!
snmp-server name "vsp-dvr-leaf-01"
!
! DVR Configuration
dvr leaf
dvr domain-id 1
!
! IP Shortcuts Configuration
ip-shortcuts enable
!
! VLAN Configuration for DVR
vlan create 100 type port-mstprstp 0
vlan create 200 type port-mstprstp 0
!
! I-SID Configuration for DVR VLANs
vlan i-sid 100 10100
vlan i-sid 200 10200
!
! Interface VLAN for DVR Gateway
interface Vlan 100
   ip address 10.100.0.1 255.255.255.0
   ip dvr-host-routing
exit
!
interface Vlan 200
   ip address 10.200.0.1 255.255.255.0
   ip dvr-host-routing
exit
!
! DVR Gateway MAC
dvr gateway-mac 00:00:5e:00:01:01
!
! ISIS for DVR Backbone
router isis
   spbm 1
   dvr
   no shutdown
exit
!
! Routing Configuration
router bgp 65000
   no shutdown
exit
!
ip route 0.0.0.0/0 10.0.0.1
!
